page.title: 10MY HAMLET_OLD WALLS
page.content:
OLD WALLS IS A SMALL HAMLET.ALTOGETHER THERE ARE ABOUT A DOZEN HOUSES.IT HAS A CHAPEL,A SMALL GARAGE,A POLICE HOUSE,A SMALL SHOP AND A PUBLIC HOUSE CALLED THE GREYHOUND.THERE ARE LOTS OF FIELDS IN OLD WALLS IN WHICH ARE GROWN HAY POTATOES AND OTHER VEGETABLES.THERE IS ALSO GRAZING LAND FOR HORSES CATTLE AND SHEEP.OLD WALLS IS A BUSY PLACE IN THE SUMMER WHEN ALL THE TOURISTS ARE GOING TO THE BEACHES IN LLANGENNITH AND LLANMADOC.BEHIND OLD WALLS IS CEFN BRYN ON TOP OF WHICH STANDS KING ARTHUR'S STONE.ONE LEGEND SAYS THAT MERLIN KING ARTHUR'S WIZARD THREW THE STONE UP THERE FROM PENDINE BEACH IN A FIT OF TEMPER,BUT IN FACT ,IT IS A NEOLITHIC BURIAL GROUND.
CLARE GARRARD AGE 11 OLD WALLS
